title: error code 2755
body:
didnt have this issue last time i installed so that means one of your patches broke the installer and since there is no post about this error code from what i could see after searching i figured id make this one so a rioter could log in and explain it

to lazy to make a ticket and ive heard far to many bad things about your customer "support" to bother even trying

same windows ten same hardware as the last time i installed reminds me of your Christmas surprise when i started playing and i had to turn shit in internet explorer on to use the store. stop adding virus like parts to your  installer.

replies.body:
the clean install fixed it a file some where got deleted just played a bot game to change setting 
-_-
irvan is broken as fuck

wasnt watching close enough but if allies can proc the bush aa he needs to be nerfed into the group asap since you get a {{item:3115}}  and become a ap nasus

i have all my save data backed up if ya cant figure anything out i do plan on doing a clean os install tomarrow and will post if it worked or not

ik for a fact it should work because when i first put this machine together i had a buddy helping me because of my huge hands and this is on of 4 games i insta re-installed so its weird for it to not work this time

after i click and aprove everything when i reach the install button i clikc it and it takes me to a vcredx86 
-_-
microsoft visual c++ 2005 redistributable

yellow ! triangle  
the installer has encountred an unexpected error installing this package. this may indicate a problem with this package. the error code is 2755
-_-

after the second error proc it moves to a error 1632

-_-
yellow ! triangle
sever returned unexpected error 1632 attempting to reinstall package c/......../....../......./....

finally it quits out saying it stopped prematurely
-_- 

i dont think i have internet explore because of Microsoft edge. and i know for a fact internet explorer affected my in game store when i had java or another setting off in it.

google leauge in chrome
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/
into the installer
-_-

let me know if ya need anything else its late so if we cant solve this in the next hour or two ima have to goto bed and we will have to play tag
when i tried to install the abdoe air part it bugged and said error 2755 idk why but my key board doesn't let screen shots happen so one sec ill report more details i got re open it and type it all
Can you provide a bit more context on what the error states, or better yet, [grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) and send it to me?
